detail_desc: Sleeveless top in seersucker with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a bow.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce a the hem.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Pyjama bottoms in soft velour with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Platform sandals in imitation suede with a braided jute trim around the soles. Narrow foot straps and a metal buckle with an adjustable fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Ballet pumps in soft leather with blunt toes. Leather insoles.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed, roll-edge V-neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Platform boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seams and chunky soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 5 cm.
Cold shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps, long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.

Striped shirt in a soft poplin made from a viscose blend in a straight cut with a gently tapered waist. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ribbed top in an airy viscose blend with a V-neck, lacing at the front, dropped shoulders and short cap sleeves.
Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in viscose jersey with short sleeves, a double-layered top, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Straight-cut vest top in a viscose weave with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective lenses.
Boxy-style top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Cropped top in smocked jersey with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication around the shoulders and hems. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Straight-cut, calf-length shirt dress in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a round neck, sequins on the front and shimmering buttons.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Small scarf in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and mulberry silk blend. Size 55x55 cm.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Fitted shirt dress in a crisp cotton weave with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and rounded sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication, fake back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in creases at the front.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Double-layered headband in a soft, chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and ties at the front. Asymmetric cut with a shorter front. Unlined.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in jersey with contrasting colour panels and a cut-out V-neck. Cap sleeves, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Popover jacket in a woven cotton blend with a drawstring hood, collar, zip at the front and concealed zip at one side. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and a concealed compartment with a zip. Lined.

Sleeveless top in a lightweight cotton weave with elastication across the back and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps with broderie anglaise and overlocked scalloped edges. The shoulder straps join at the back with a decorative bow.
5-pocket shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist with decorative ties, a fake fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Flared skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with smocking at the waist.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress with a sequined mesh front and satin back. Visible zip at the back and a flared skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.
Treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Wide trousers in a cool viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Metal rings in various designs. Three of the rings are smooth.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn in turn-ups.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat knitted in a soft wool, alpaca and nylon blend with a wide, ribbed hem.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and high cut at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra top in ribbed fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
V-neck slipover in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Long-sleeved velour body with a draped collar and deep neckline at the front ending in a wrapover knot detail. Press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a washed look, high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing and a tongue at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Parka in soft cotton twill with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with concealed press-studs, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Adjustable elastication at the waist and covered elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Flannel shirt in a woven cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Striped dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, gentle V-neck and buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Set with a top and pair of dungarees in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Hairband in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastic at the back.
Fitted top in soft jersey with flounced cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with 3/4-length legs and contrasting colour elastication at the waist.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, patch front pockets and large, side-opening chest pockets. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Hairband with leaf and flower appliqués.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with appliqués, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Long, sleeveless dress in viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

Single-breasted jacket in a marled linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and imitation suede elbow patches. Chest pocket, flap front pockets, a fastening with two buttons at the front, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Partly lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Double-breasted coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Lightweight slides with moulded insoles, an adjustable foot strap with a plastic buckle, and fluted soles.
Faux fur, soft toy bracelets with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3x20 cm.

Calf-length, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Jersey lining.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Fully lined, waist-high, glittery bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Short, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif, gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
